title: Creamy Chicken and Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta

ingredients.content: 70 g brown onion, cut in halves
1 sprig fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
1 sprig fresh basil, leaves only, plus extra for garnishing
¼ - ½ fresh red chilli, deseeded if preferred
500 g chicken breasts, skinless, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)

preparations.content: Place onion, garlic, parsley, basil, chilli, sun-dried tomatoes and butter in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then cook <b>3 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add chicken, cream, water, wine and stock paste and cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add pasta and cook <b>7-10 min/100°C//speed <b>, or until pasta is al dente.
Garnish pasta with extra basil before serving.
